title: Bug 124777 - Exception when setting a blank tooltip in chart title during preview
OB: When a blank tooltip is set in the chart title and the chart is previewed, it results in an unexpected exception dialog being displayed.
EB: During the chart preview in the viewer, if the mouse is moved over the chart title with a blank tooltip, the expected behavior is that nothing should happen. No exception dialog should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Set a blank tooltip in the chart title.
2. Preview the chart in the viewer.
3. Move the mouse over the chart title to trigger the issue.
